title: How to enable Lockdown on Google Pixel – and why you might want to
content:
Lockdown is a feature on Google Pixel meant to protect your phone if someone tries to access it without permission — something no one wants, but some people have experienced, unfortunately. This guide will go through exactly how to enable the feature.

more…

The post How to enable Lockdown on Google Pixel – and why you might want to appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Anything can happen. That's why knowing how to enable Lockdown on your Google Pixel is vital information. Here's how you can do it.
